name: Parcel Relay Network
description: A reliable long-distance delivery system for parcels and messages via a series of relay runners or mounted couriers.

name: Cargo Offloading Team
description: A trained crew available to rapidly and safely offload goods from ships or caravans.

name: Timber Harvesting License
description: Official documentation allowing sanctioned tree cutting in designated areas.

name: Skilled Day Laborers
description: A crew of guild-certified workers available for temporary hire in physical construction, lifting, or hauling.

name: Mine Shaft Inspection
description: Safety inspection of existing mine shafts and tunnels by certified guild engineers.

name: Navigational Charter Service
description: Custom nautical routes drawn for specific voyages, optimized for speed or safety.

name: Uncharted Region Survey
description: An expedition team to explore and document unexplored wilderness, ruins, or magical anomalies.
